Package backendGUIExtensions

Class SaveGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • backendGUIExtensions.SaveGame
  • public class SaveGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows player to save the current game state and load game saves
    Author:
    hoo42, rvo16
